articles.title: New CDC mask guidance may spur more Americans to get Covid vaccine, says Dr. Scott Gottlieb - CNBC
articles.description: Former FDA chief Dr. Scott Gottlieb told CNBC more Americans may go get vaccinated due to the CDC's relaxed mask guidance.
articles.content:
The CDC's updated face mask guidance is likely to prompt vaccine-hesitant Americans to get a Covid shot, Dr. Scott Gottlieb told CNBC on Friday.

articles.description: The president wrote that Americans would have to wear a face covering until they were vaccinated against COVID-19.
